statements: SELECT * FROM clinical_trial_data WHERE patient_age > 50 ORDER BY trial_start_date DESC
SELECT trial_name, patient_name, patient_age FROM clinical_trial_data WHERE patient_gender = 'Female'
SELECT trial_id, trial_name, trial_start_date, trial_end_date FROM clinical_trial_data WHERE trial_start_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, patient_gender FROM clinical_trial_data WHERE patient_age < 30 ORDER BY patient_name ASC
SELECT trial_name, patient_name, patient_age, patient_gender FROM clinical_trial_data WHERE patient_age BETWEEN 40 AND 60 ORDER BY patient_age DESC
SELECT * FROM clinical_trial_data WHERE patient_age > 50 ORDER BY trial_start_date DESC
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, patient_gender FROM clinical_trial_data WHERE trial_id = 3

SELECT trial_id, trial_name, patient_name, patient_age, patient_gender FROM clinical_trial_data WHERE trial_start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND trial_end_date <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY patient_age ASC, trial_end_date DESC
SELECT COUNT(patient_id) AS num_patients, AVG(patient_age) AS avg_age FROM clinical_trial_data WHERE patient_gender = 'Male'
SELECT trial_id, trial_name, patient_name FROM clinical_trial_data WHERE patient_age BETWEEN 40 AND 60 AND (patient_gender = 'Female' OR patient_gender = 'Other') ORDER BY trial_id ASC
SELECT * FROM ClinicalTrials;
SELECT trial_name, start_date, end_date FROM ClinicalTrials;
SELECT trial_id, trial_name FROM ClinicalTrials WHERE status = 'Active';
SELECT patient_name, age FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM ClinicalTrials ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM ClinicalTrials WHERE status = 'Active';
SELECT trial_id, trial_name FROM ClinicalTrials ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT trial_name, start_date, end_date FROM ClinicalTrials WHERE status = 'Active' ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Patients JOIN ClinicalTrials ON Patients.trial_id = ClinicalTrials.trial_id;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT trial_name, start_date, end_date FROM clinical_trials WHERE status='ongoing';
SELECT data_id, data_value FROM trial_data WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT patient_id, condition FROM patients WHERE age > 50 AND gender='female';
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT patient_name, age, condition FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT trial_name, start_date, end_date FROM clinical_trials WHERE status = 'Active' ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM trial_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY trial_id, timestamp DESC;

SELECT patient_name, age, condition, trial_name FROM patients p JOIN trial_data td ON p.patient_id = td.patient_id JOIN clinical_trials ct ON td.trial_id = ct.trial_id WHERE ct.status = 'Completed' ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE age > 50;
SELECT hospital_name, location FROM hospitals ORDER BY hospital_name ASC;
SELECT trial_name, start_date, end_date FROM clinical_trials WHERE status = 'Active';
SELECT participant_id, trial_id, patient_id, hospital_id, enrollment_date FROM trial_participants WHERE status = 'Enrolled';
SELECT * FROM patients ORDER BY age DESC, patient_name;
SELECT patient_name, gender, date_of_birth FROM patients WHERE age > 40 AND gender='Male';
SELECT hospital_name, location, bed_capacity FROM hospitals WHERE bed_capacity > 200 ORDER BY hospital_name;
SELECT trial_name, start_date, sponsor FROM clinical_trials WHERE status='Active' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT participant_id, enrollment_date, exit_date FROM trial_participants WHERE status='Enrolled' ORDER BY enrollment_date;
SELECT * FROM Trials;
SELECT trial_name, start_date, end_date FROM Trials;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age FROM Patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM TrialPatients ORDER BY enrollment_date DESC;
SELECT researcher_name, specialization FROM Researchers;
SELECT * FROM Trials WHERE status = 'completed';
SELECT trial_name, start_date, end_date FROM Trials ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age;
SELECT trial_name, patient_name, result_value, result_date FROM Trials INNER JOIN TrialResults ON Trials.trial_id = TrialResults.trial_id ORDER BY result_date DESC;
SELECT researcher_name, specialization, institution FROM Researchers ORDER BY researcher_name ASC;
